General.Name: Hyungkuk F&B Co Ltd
General.Description: HYUNGKUK F&B Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells foods and beverages in Korea. It offers concentrates, smoothies, real base, powder, ice shavers, ice blocks, toppings, coffee, gelato, bakery products, coffee machine, ice dessert, and other product. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
